html: Nobe. He may arrive thither shortly, in the environs of Jerusalem. (Calmet) — Septuagint, "exhort to-day, that they may continue on the road. Comfort with the hand the daughter of Sion, thou rock and hills within Jerusalem." (Haydock) — Hand. As Nicanor did against the temple, 2 Machabees xv. 32. (Calmet)
